wdkModel.constant: select distinct io.input_pan_id as internal from ApidbTuning.D0ad509829ePANIO io, (##FILTERED_IDS##) fi where io.output_pan_id = fi.internal and io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024'

dateRangeParam.name: date_range
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for computing mosquito counts."

filterParamNew.name: households_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: geographic_region_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select dwellngs based on geographic region.

filterParamNew.name: participants_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

enumParam.name: district
enumParam.help: Choose the study sites (districts) for your search.

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.category = 'Household' union select da.pan_id, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id group by da.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) union select da.pan_id, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) and da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$date_range.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$date_range.max$$ group by da.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where category = 'Household' and property_source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where m.category = 'Participant' and m.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and io.input_pan_id in ($$households_prism$$)
